name: ListPurchaseOrders
description: Retrieve a list of all purchase orders.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization to filter purchase orders.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: search_by_purchaseorder_number
parameters.description: Search purchase order by number. Supports exact, starts with, and contains variants.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by purchase order number. Variants: purchaseorder_number_startswith and purchaseorder_number_contains. Example: Locate specific PO by number or partial match.

parameters.name: reference_number_search
parameters.description: Search for a purchase order using the exact or partial reference number. Supports 'startswith' and 'contains' methods.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by reference number. Variants: reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains. Example: Monitor external vendor order numbers.

parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.description: Creation date for purchase order search in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by creation date. Use YYYY-MM-DD format for exact date matching. Example: Retrieve POs created on specific date.

parameters.name: purchase_order_status
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by status. Options: draft, open, billed, cancelled.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by status. Allowed values: draft, open, billed, cancelled. Example: Filter POs by current workflow state.

parameters.name: search_by_item_description
parameters.description: Search purchase orders by item description. Use partial matches or specific description. Includes variants like 'startswith' and 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by item description. Variants: item_description_startswith and item_description_contains. Example: Discover POs containing specific items.

parameters.name: vendor_name
parameters.description: Search purchase orders by vendor name with optional 'startswith' or 'contains' variants.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by vendor name. Variants: vendor_name_startswith and vendor_name_contains

parameters.name: total_amount_filter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by total amount. Use options like 'start', 'end', 'less_than', 'less_equals', 'greater_than', 'greater_equals' to specify the range or comparison.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by total amount. Variants: total_start, total_end, total_less_than, total_less_equals, total_greater_than, total_greater_equals. Example: Identify POs within price range.

parameters.name: vendor_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the unique ID of the vendor to filter purchase orders. Useful for grouping POs by a specific vendor.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by vendor ID. Use the unique identifier of the vendor to filter purchase orders. Example: Group POs by specific vendor.

parameters.name: search_by_last_modified_time
parameters.description: ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±HH:MM) to filter POs by last modified time. For finding recently updated POs.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by last modified time. Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±HH:MM). Example: Identify recently updated POs.

parameters.name: search_by_item_id
parameters.description: Search purchase orders using the unique item ID to find POs containing a specific item.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by item ID. Use the unique identifier of the specific item. Example: Locate all POs containing particular item.

parameters.name: status_filter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by status. Use 'Status.All', 'Status.Draft', 'Status.Open', 'Status.Billed', or 'Status.Cancelled'.

value_schema.description: Filter purchase order by status. Allowed values: Status.All, Status.Draft, Status.Open, Status.Billed, Status.Cancelled. Example: Bulk status filtering for reporting.

parameters.name: search_purchase_order_text
parameters.description: Search for purchase orders by number, reference, or vendor name. Allows general searching across multiple fields for quick lookup.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by number, reference, or vendor name. General search across multiple fields. Example: Quick PO lookup without specific field.

parameters.name: sort_by_column
parameters.description: Column to sort purchase orders by. Options: vendor_name, purchaseorder_number, date, delivery_date, total, created_time.

value_schema.description: Sort purchase orders by column. Allowed values: vendor_name, purchaseorder_number, date, delivery_date, total, created_time. Example: Organize results for analysis.

parameters.name: search_by_custom_field
parameters.description: Search purchase orders using custom field criteria. Supports 'startswith' and 'contains' variants.

value_schema.description: Search purchase order by purchase order’s custom field. Variants: custom_field_startswith, custom_field_contains

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to fetch, with a default value of 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of purchase orders to retrieve per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
